item.description:
Come join us for a fun filled Girls Just Want to Have Fun Weekend in Boston before the hectic holiday season starts!

We'll be staying at the Sheraton Boston Hotel.   Each room reserved has 2 double beds, thus two women per room.   The cost is $107.60 per person including tax for each person for the two night stay!

*Parking is $44.00 + tax per night--the plan is to carpool so we can split the cost and Save, Save, Save!

*Bring extra money for food, drink, and shopping!

Itinerary

Friday Night: We can get settled in on our first night and have dinner at the Side Bar & Grill Restaurant which is located in the hotel and serves American Cuisine and is causual dress.  I get 50% off for us on our food bill because I work in the hotel industry!

Saturday Morning: We can have breakfast at Cafe Apropros in the hotel at  9:30 am-ish.  Again, I will be able to get 50% off our food bill!  Whoopi!

Saturday Afternoon:   Around noonish we, can take the T to Fanuel Hall , and have a late lunch, and/or shop at Down Town Crossings.

Saturday Evening: If you want to save money, we can have dinner, again, at the Side Bar & Grill unless group concensus is otherwise.

Saturday Night: We can visit a local club and maybe even find a Halloween Party!

Sunday Morning: Breakfast at Cafe Apropros in the hotel at 10:00 am-ish.

Check out is Noon!

**For those that can leave early, we can meet at my house to carpool, otherwise I can arrange to meet you at the hotel.  (We can cover those details when the time gets near).

NOTE:   Also, when you sign up, tell me your preference for who you want as a roommate in the notes next to your name. 

I know everyone has a different schedule on Friday so those that can leave at 5:00 PM can carpool with me.  I can fit 5 in my car including me! That way we can save on parking!

We'll definetly need at least one more person to volunteer to carpool.

***Payment needs to be send to me by October 14th
item.how_to_find_us: You'll either meet me at my house or the hotel!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun Take Boston by Storm Weekend!
